医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
膀胱癌治疗的进展为治疗带来希望根据《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的一篇社论，膀胱癌治疗的最新进展可能为更多患者带来治疗的希望，包括那些患有高危局部肌肉侵袭性疾病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Advances-in-bladder-cancer-treatments-offer-hope-for-curative-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Advances-in-bladder-cancer-treatments-offer-hope-for-curative-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e31aa50-0248-4f0a-8836-594108ec4e5b Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:34:38 -0500 Advances in bladder cancer treatments offer hope for curative care
新疫苗显示出预防三阴性乳腺癌复发的潜力一项小型临床试验显示，接受旨在预防肿瘤复发的研究疫苗的三阴性乳腺癌患者取得了有希望的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-vaccine-shows-pottial-in-preventing-recurrence-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-vaccine-shows-pottial-in-preventing-recurrence-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ecd4b4-d11e-4678-8b02-8b945890e3e5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:27:59 -0500 New vaccine shows potential in preventing recurrence of triple-negative breast cancer
社区伙伴关系为神经多样性个体带来更具包容性的医疗保健一篇新论文展示了如何与社区合作可以带来更具包容性的医疗保健，特别是对于患有自闭症和其他神经发育障碍的个人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Community-partnerships-lead-to-more-inclusive-health-care-for-neurodiverse-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Community-partnerships-lead-to-more-inclusive-health-care-for-neurodiverse-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d874babf-b01a-4b5c-9fa2-c15ac80caa57 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:10:38 -0500 Community partnerships lead to more inclusive health care for neurodiverse individuals
Primerdesign 在伦敦兽医展上推出新的动物多重检测Primerdesign（Novacyt Group 的一部分）是一家专注于设计、制造、验证和供应实时 PCR 试剂盒和试剂的公司，该公司宣布将在 2019 年推出两种针对狗和猫胃肠道 (GI) 疾病的新检测方法。伦敦兽医展，2024 年 11 月 14 日至 15 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Primerdesign-launches-new-animal- Multiplex-assays-at-London-Vet-Show.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Primerdesign-launches-new-animal- Multiplex-assays-at-London-Vet-Show.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45674265-03be-47be-b19f-2693bddbdfe2 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:23:00 -0500 Primerdesign launches new animal multiplex assays at London Vet Show
研究确定了桑德霍夫病和泰萨克斯病的潜在治疗方法在一项开创性的研究中，麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现了桑霍夫病和泰萨克斯病的潜在治疗方法，这两种罕见且往往致命的溶酶体贮积症会导致大脑和脊髓神经细胞进行性损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-identizes-a-pottial-treatment-for-Sandhoff-and-Tay-Sachs-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-identizes-a-pottial-treatment-for-Sandhoff-and-Tay-Sachs-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c3436c-ca09-4743-aaf9-5f66884530d4 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:19:00 -0500 Study identifies a potential treatment for Sandhoff and Tay-Sachs diseases
CN Bio 推出 PhysioMimix 生物利用度检测试剂盒：Human 18 CN Bio 是加速药物发现和开发工作流程的芯片器官系统和解决方案的领先供应商，今天宣布推出 PhysioMimix® 生物利用度检测试剂盒：Human 18。利用 PhysioMimix 多器官系统的功能，该试剂盒增强了先导化合物优化和临床前测试流程，提供了一种一体化解决方案，可以生成对人类口服生物利用度的预测性见解，并更好地为先导候选药物的选择提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/CN-Bio-launches-PhysioMimix-Bioavailability-assay-kit-Human-18.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/CN-Bio-launches-PhysioMimix-Bioavailability-assay-kit-Human-18.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65066de4-ae72-4693-8467-4b0348b4c7a5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:17:00 -0500 CN Bio launches PhysioMimix Bioavailability assay kit: Human 18
Sphere Fluidics 加强全球商业团队并在北美建立直接销售和支持渠道Sphere Fluidics 是一家领先的基于液滴的微流体解决方案的领先供应商，该解决方案用于大规模单细胞功能分析，今天宣布大幅扩展其全球商业业务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Sphere-Fluidics-strengthens-global-commercial-teams-and-builtes-direct-sales-and-support-channel-in-North-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Sphere-Fluidics-strengthens-global-commercial-teams-and-builtes-direct-sales-and-support-channel-in-North-America.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=159f42db-279d-4160-bf9e-5939b0c140c5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:15:00 -0500 Sphere Fluidics strengthens global commercial teams and establishes direct sales and support channel in North America
加州利用禽流感大流行库存，官员们密切关注支出加州公共卫生官员正在动用州和联邦储备，为多达 10,000 名农场工人配备口罩、手套、护目镜和其他安全装备，截至 11 月初，该州已确认至少 21 例人感染禽流感病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/As-California-taps-pandemic-stockpile-for-bird-flu-officials-keep-close-eye-on-spending.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/As-California-taps-pandemic-stockpile-for-bird-flu-officials-keep-close-eye-on-spending.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c43ee3be-c6b5-41ec-b0aa-762d40ee87e6 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 05:56:00 -0500 As California taps pandemic stockpile for bird flu, officials keep close eye on spending
国会结束对家庭的额外现金援助后，社区独自解决儿童贫困问题如果您带婴儿来到密歇根州弗林特市中心的赫尔利儿童中心诊所，莫娜·汉娜会找到您。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/After-Congress-ending-extra-cash-aid-for-families-communities-tackle-child-poverty-alone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/After-Congress-ending-extra-cash-aid-for-families-communities-tackle-child-poverty-alone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ca19011-bb95-44af-985a-29d50f9921e8 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 05:54:00 -0500 After Congress ended extra cash aid for families, communities tackle child poverty alone
FasL 抑制剂可加速 COVID-19 重症患者的康复并降低死亡率一项新的临床研究表明，Fas 配体 (FasL) 抑制剂，也称为 CD95 配体 (CD95L)，可以使 COVID-19 患者更快康复并降低死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/FasL-inhibitor-speeds-recovery-and-reduces-mortality-in-severe-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/FasL-inhibitor-speeds-recovery-and-reduces-mortality-in-severe-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8391f63b-11be-464d-88df-0775f775cea7 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 03:49:43 -0500 FasL inhibitor speeds recovery and reduces mortality in severe COVID-19 patients
